enb_long_title: Workshop on synergies and cooperation with other conventions
sentences: Keynote Presentation: Avani Vaish, GEF, provided an overview of the GEF`s work on climate change adaptation.
He said that the GEF addresses adaptation as a cross- sectoral issue, and that its actions are both guided and constrained by the COP`s guidance.

He said the GEF has addressed adaptation through strengthening enabling environments including the preparation of initial national communications and by incorporating adaptation components into existing GEF projects.
